title: I Parted Countlessly From My Beloved Over A Millennium, Now I Shall Become The Wicked Lady
alternative_title: 愛しのあの方と死に別れて千年～今日も私は悪役令嬢を演じます～ ; 愛しのあの方と死に別れて千年 ; Itoshi no Ano Kata to Shiniwakarete Sennen ; Itoshi no Ano Kata to Shiniwakarete Sennen ~ Kyou mo Watashi wa Akuyaku Reijou wo Enjimasu ~ ; Itoshi no Ano Kata to Shi ni Wakarete Sennen ~ Kyou mo Watashi wa Akuyaku Reijou wo Enjimasu ~
status: 愛しのあの方と死に別れて千年～今日も私は悪役令嬢を演じます～ ; 愛しのあの方と死に別れて千年 ; Itoshi no Ano Kata to Shiniwakarete Sennen ; Itoshi no Ano Kata to Shiniwakarete Sennen ~ Kyou mo Watashi wa Akuyaku Reijou wo Enjimasu ~ ; Itoshi no Ano Kata to Shi ni Wakarete Sennen ~ Kyou mo Watashi wa Akuyaku Reijou wo Enjimasu ~
description:
Description :
        From Gourmet Scans:
"Swear... that you will never fall in love with me, no matter what."
A thousand years ago, a sad fate separated this pair of lovers.
No matter how many times they reincarnated and reconnected, it always ended with his tragic death...
And once again they are reincarnated, as a count’s daughter, Amelia, and a marquis’s son, William.
"I absolutely will not let him die this time!"
Having decided this, Amelia swore that she 'won't love him anymore', and put on an act of being a wicked lady.
However, puzzlingly, he is the one trying to get close to Amelia this time, and even sends her a marriage proposal...?!
